participant_1.background:
I have a lust for my neighbor's pool boy, and a need to be creative.
I'm looking for a home with a large closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.
I play the harmonica in my spare time.
i sing barbershop and rap.
I want someone who can make me laugh and share my love of pizza.

participant_2.background:
I design and sew clothes to distract from the disappointment that is my family.
I'm not interested in marriage, and archery is my passion.
one of my favorite shows is face off on syfy.
I want a new home that is affordable and close to work so I can save money and keep my financial troubles a secret from my parents.
i read a lot.

content.text: Hi there, what are you up to today?
Hi there, I'm just designing some clothes. What about you?
I'm trying to find a new home. I want one with a big closet so I can have plenty of space for my sewing supplies.
That sounds like a great idea! I love sewing clothes too. It's so therapeutic.
I know right? It's so relaxing. I also love to sing. I sing barbershop and rap. What are your hobbies?
I love to read and watch my favorite show, Face Off. I also love to go archery, it's a great stress reliever.
I love to read too! What's your favorite book?
I just finished reading "The Girl on the Train". It was so good!
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out to eat with my friends, watch movies, and go shopping.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun! I like to do those things too.
I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too. I'm sure we could have a lot of fun together.
